plot: The death of Carmine Falcone and a post-flood crime wave motivates Oz Cobb to fill the power vacuum left in the criminal underworld of Gotham City, while Falcone's children attempt to keep their family together.

In the aftermath of the Riddler blowing up Gotham City's seawall, gangster and drug lord Oz Cobb schemes to come out on top of the Falcone and the Maroni mob, after and killing Alberto Falcone in a fit of anger when Alberto dares to laugh at him.—Gislef

Gotham City is in a state of chaos after a part of the sea wall is blown up by The Riddler and large areas of the city flooded. The crime underworld is in a state of transition after the death of kingpin Carmine Falcone and the passing of the baton to his wild, hedonistic son Alberto. A senior soldier in the Falcone army, Oz Cobb, sees an opportunity.—grantss
